Keywords: Batman Family , Cosmic , Detective , Gotham City , Green Lantern Corps , Herald , Justice League
Real Name: Bruce Wayne
Special Powers
IN DARKEST NIGHT...: Batman may have both BTU #s001 Utility Belt and BTU #s002 Green Lantern Ring assigned and equipped at the same time.
FLOCK OF GREEN BATS: Smoke Cloud. Smoke Cloud as FREE, but only to generate 1 marker. // Opposing characters occupying or adjacent to Batman's Smoke Cloud markers can't use Improved Movement abilities and must break away as if they were adjacent to Batman.
I AM WILLPOWER: Invincible, Willpower. When Batman uses Willpower and succeeds, after resolutions modify his combat values +1 until your next turn.

Comments
January 16, 2023
TheClixCave
Don't get me wrong, I think he's pretty amazing, but his lack of inproved targeting means he's going to get into a lot of situations where the opponent also hides in free smoke/hindering. The hydrant is going to be his go-to construct for stopping that, but at the same time someone can hydrant his smokes too. One outwit and his defense is bare.
January 7, 2023
fghrt
Ok what is this??? Like, buddy... are you good??? First question - WHO HURT YOU???? Next, utility belt AND GL Ring?!?!? At a cursory glance, if I had to guess a character who possessed the MOST powers/effects... It'd be this guy. Utility belt is great. The GL ring lets you bring in constructs...Oh then you still have specials on attack and defense... Next Next... those specials...With Batman TA, he can cloak himself free.... THEN he has almost a faux plasticity AT RANGE..... THEN Beefy defense PLUS stat booster, give him GL ring and WP goes off 50/50....Oh, let's also throw in outwit... just because...AND ALL THIS FOR 100 POINTS!?!?!? Good lord... I'd LOVE to play this guy, and feel HORRIBLE at the same time.
December 22, 2022
Emtemss
I've seen few things that could draw me back in to playing this game again, even just for the occasional fun game. This is one of them. Hard to not want to try this guy out. He looks great to me. Only "meta" if the equips are amazing, but just looks fun.
